sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react"; const PlaceholderFields = ({id, togglePlaceholderModal}) => { const [selectedField, setSelectedField] = useState("") const addValue = (value) => { const el = document.getElementById(id); let textToInsert = value let cursorPosition = el.selectionStart let textBeforeCursorPosition = el.value.substring(0, cursorPosition) let textAfterCursorPosition = el.value.substring(cursorPosition, el.value.length) el.value = textBeforeCursorPosition + textToInsert + textAfterCursorPosition togglePlaceholderModal() } return(

Insert Fields

  • Prospects
  • Users
